articles.description: How does the startup world look at the latest controversy involving the BharatPe cofounder, and what do the aggressive entrepreneur and the silent board reveal about the ecosystem?

articles.title: 90 founders among 500 US unicorns were India born: study - Economic Times
articles.description: A recent report by venture capital fund Orios Venture Partners said Indian startups raised $42 billion in 2021, up from $11.5 billion in the previous year.
